With a tender embrace, Tucson holds Talon gently in his arms, with a smile =
as gentile as his touch.

"Talon, it's good to be back, I promise, I'll nev=
er leave you." 

He gives her a kiss on her forehead, and then directs an e=
ar to his comrades.

" I could hear all of you, giving me encouragement.  I=
 thank you all deeply for that, for without it, I don't know if I could hav=
e returned as I have."

Rat Trap smiles as does Quickstride.

"Welcome home=
 Wheels. We missed you."

Rat Trap now walks into the room, as he smiles up=
 to Tucson, and then in rat form, gives his friend an affectionate hug.

" =
I dunno what I'd ever do if you hadn't rolled inta my life like ya did."

T=
ucson smiles.

"Likewise, Talon, you, everyone, if I hadn't met all of you,=
 I wouldn't be content as I am now.  I have everything I need, right here w=
ith me.  And there isn't anything else I'd ever ask for.  Not even ultimate=
 power. The only thing missing now, is Rodimus.  But I have a feeling that =
will change very soon."

He smiles as he looks over to Rodimus.
